name: Sherman Tank Tactics
description:
Lead your squad of Sherman tanks on various missions against the Axis forces. This is a real time strategy/tactics game where you try to eliminate the enemy and reach your objectives.

Instructions

Use the mouse to select your units and chose which enemy units to attack. The left mouse button is used to select single units or to drag a box around multiple units. Left clicking on an enemy will set it as the primary target for the selected units.

Backstory

This was an early Unity prototype I developed back in 2019 with the intention of releasing it on the play store, however the interface never really worked on smaller screen devices. This was the first project where I created the majority of the models myself using Blender, this was a good learning process and did a lot to improve my modelling skills. That said it also dragged out the project time significantly.

I've decided to post it after all this time to get feedback so please leave a comment below regardless of whether you love it or hate it.
